name: Harry DARBY, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Darby v. Commonwealth, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

judges: Justice EAKIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Harry DARBY, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of February, 2016, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
Justice EAKIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John Jason Talaber, Barbara L. Christie, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
131 A.3d 986
Harry DARBY, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 16, 2016.
Harry Darby, Frackville, pro se.
John Jason Talaber, Barbara L. Christie, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole.
